itunes:title: Easily Distracted by New Releases Part II
title: Easily Distracted by New Releases Part II
description:
In Episode 47 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share their recent new release reads. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk what distracts them in their reading livesÂ  Â
